title: (x) "that color cognition" low contrast serif face - Cheltenham {James}
content:
Hi! I am trying to ID this typeface. Any ideas? I love the “g”.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/font-to-decipher.gif)

Thanks!
author: bethany

comments.content:
Can someone please help me identify the two fonts used on the titles of Simon & Garfunkel ‘s  
albums “Wednesday Morning 3:00 AM ” and “Old Friends Live on Stage”? I believe you can see them at Amazon .com Thanks, Judith

Sorry all it was my first post. I think I found the right place now.
